nodes.label: Credit Calculator Coordinator
nodes.description: Manager agent orchestrating architecture and cost calculation

nodes.label: Architecture Designer Agent
nodes.description: Analyzes problem and generates agent architecture

nodes.label: Cost Estimator Agent
nodes.description: Calculates project costs based on architecture

agents.name: Credit Calculator Coordinator
agents.description: Orchestrates the architecture generation and cost estimation workflow, aggregates final output with architecture blueprint and cost breakdown
agents.agent_goal: Receive user problem statement and coordinate between Architecture Designer and Cost Estimator agents to deliver complete solution cost estimation

agents.name: Architecture Designer Agent
agents.description: Analyzes user problem statements to design optimal Lyzr agent architectures with complete component specifications
agents.agent_goal: Analyze application requirements and generate detailed agent architecture with component count, pattern recommendations, and technology stack

agents.name: Cost Estimator Agent
agents.description: Applies Lyzr pricing matrix to architecture specifications and generates detailed cost breakdowns
agents.agent_goal: Receive architecture specification and calculate itemized project costs with model-specific pricing and monthly projections
